Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman hit a two-run home run in the first inning
Alex Verdugo hit a two-run homer with two outs in the ninth
Pre-Game Insights: Shohei Ohtani is in the lineup despite an injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers hold a commanding 3-0 series lead
Others: The Dodgers received five scoreless innings from starter Walker Buehler
The L.A. bullpen kept the Yankees in check until the ninth
